M

main(String[]) - Static method in class piiksuma.Arranque
 
mapList() - Method in class piiksuma.database.QueryMapper
When the Cass to be used wasn't defined with QueryMapper.defineClass(Class) this method resturns the query results mapped into a list containing Map instances with the column names used as keys in the Map, and the values from the result tuples
mappedClass - Variable in class piiksuma.database.Mapper
 
Mapper<T> - Class in piiksuma.database
Common functionality between all the Mapper Classes.
Mapper(Connection) - Constructor for class piiksuma.database.Mapper
 
MapperColumn - Annotation Type in piiksuma.database
Indicates that the Fields has to be mapped when using the database
MapperTable - Annotation Type in piiksuma.database
Annotation used to indicate the corresponding table to the current class.
